content.content: Hi! I’m Alex and welcome to my site

I’m a Frontend developer with full stack knowledge located in the United Kingdom I have experience with everything from Android development to SCSS. I specialise in TypeScript and have lots of experience with React and frontend experience overall working in a number of different industries in the UK and Singapore. I have backend knowledge with Node (Express and Nest) and C# (.Net Core) and work on AWS and Azure. I love learning new things and playing with new ideas to see some examples check my Portfolio or Github.
